external_games.name: Tokimeki Memorial Drama Series Vol. 2: Irodori no Love Song
Tokimeki Memorial Drama Series Vol. 2: Irodori no Love Song

name: Tokimeki Memorial Drama Series Vol. 2: Irodori no Love Song
summary: Tokimeki Memorial Drama Series vol. 2: Irodori no Lovesong is a visual novel spin-off game of the original Tokimeki Memorial. Irodori no Love Song focuses on Ayako Katagiri, with the player trying to compose a new song in time to win the school festival's band contest.
